ygData.subject: Re: Mana
ygData.msgSnippet: that s not totally true....you can melee....and you and dd....if there s more then one cleric in the group and you re in an undead dungeon, one of you might be
ygData.messageBody:
that's not totally true....you can melee....and you and dd....if there's more
then one cleric in the group and you're in an undead dungeon, one of you might
be dd'ing....just my thoughts on the matter...

Niomar wrote:

> From: "Niomar" <Niomar@...>
>
> Okay, I am now lvl 10 and really concerned about this. From what EVERYONE
> tells me (which I totally disagree with and the whole subject matter makes
> me sick) is that when older (25+) all we do is heal...no melee, no DD, just
> heal and med. First...is that true or can we still melee..I know we won't
> exactly be able to solo melee...but as in a group or possibly as the only
> tank?..and while on that subject, can we solo undead up into all our higher
> lvls or do we still need help then too? And finally the mana issue. I am
> dwarven cleric and have a 100 in strength and 103 in wisdom...will that be a
> high enough wisdom to have proper mana to heal my group and such? Any other
> tips would be most helpful.
>
> Niomar, Dwarven Cleric of 10 trainings. Xegony Server.
> Telikas, Dark Elven Mage of 14 trainings. Xegony Server.
>
> P.S. Any good cleric websites with detailed spell descriptions (like how
> much damage our spells deal, how much HPs our healing spells heal, and the
> exact numbers on our buffs, etc)
>
>
